The new league uses a similar red, white and blue basketball as the old ABA, but unlike the original ABA, it does not feature players of the same caliber as the NBA, nor does it play games in major arenas nor on television as the original ABA did. Nevertheless, the emergence of the ABA boosted the salaries of referees just as it did the salaries of players.
